## Static Analysis
We use PHPStan at Level 9 for static analysis. To check your code for potential bugs, run:

## Refactoring
We use Rector to keep the codebase modern. To run rector checks:

## Testing
We use Pest for our test suite. Before submitting your PR, please make sure all tests pass:

## Pull Request Process
1. Fork the repository and create your branch from main.
2. If you've added code that should be tested, add tests.
3. If you've changed APIs, update the documentation.
4. Ensure the test suite passes and code quality tools are satisfied.
5. Issue the pull request!
